ResearchProjectDef.label: Togas
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft togas, everyday wear of the citizens of the republic. To unlock, gain the support of 1 senator from the Central Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Large passive cooler
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make large passive coolers, a way to cool indoor spaces below freezing point without needing electricity. To unlock, gain the support of 2 senators from the Central Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Meat drying
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct meat drying racks, allowing you to preserve meat and create a roman delicacy. To unlock, gain the support of 3 senators from the Central Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mosaics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build excellent stone mosaics, utilising different colours and shapes to express beauty. Slow to construct. To unlock, gain the support of 4 senators from the Central Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thermaebath
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct large thermaebath that uses steam geysers to warm up the water, allowing up to 9 people to bathe together with an occasional chance of group lovinâ€™. To unlock, gain the support of 5 senators from the Central Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gladiator fights
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allow captured prisoners to fight to the death, where the winner gets a chance to win freedom. To unlock, gain the support of 6 senators from the Central Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy shield making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create heavy scuta shields typically associated with legionnaires. To unlock, gain the support of 1 senator from the Central Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Legionary armaments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft javelins, spathas and daggers, constituting towards the legionary armory. To unlock, gain the support of 2 senators from the Western Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Legionnaire armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create heavy armor of legionnaires, capable of withstanding a high degree of sharp damage. To unlock, gain the support of 3 senators from the Western Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Centurion armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Smith suits of centurion armor, excellent for leading men into heroic battles. Slow to construct. To unlock, gain the support of 4 senators from the Western Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Scorpion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct scorpions, a portable field artillery piece which doubles as a semi-automatic heavy crossbow. To unlock, gain the support of 5 senators from the Western Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fire arrows
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build the recurve bow equipped with flaming arrows, an effective and inexpensive ranged weapon capable of setting plants, structures and enemies on fire. To unlock, gain the support of 6 senators from the Western Republic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bronze working
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mix steel with stone chunks to create slightly weaker metal in large quantities. To unlock, gain the support of 1 senator from the Eastern Imperium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting bench
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a workbench for crafting simple things like shivs or bows. To unlock, gain the support of 2 senators from the Eastern Imperium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Legionnaire armor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct cement press, which allows you to create extremely durable stone material out of stone chunks. To unlock, gain the support of 3 senators from the Eastern Imperium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wood-fired crematorium
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a huge, wood-fired stone crematorium which vaporizes corpses with high temperatures. To unlock, gain the support of 4 senators from the Eastern Imperium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tyrian production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create a tyrian farm - a river-bank structure that dyes cloth, which can then be extracted in the form of extremely valuable tyrian fabric. To unlock, gain the support of 5 senators from the Eastern Imperium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Road building
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct paths, dirt roads and stone roads directly on the world map, allowing for faster caravan travel. To unlock, gain the support of 6 senators from the Eastern Imperium.
